name: UIGraphicsRenderer
desc: An abstract base class for creating graphics renderers.

items.name: init(bounds: CGRect)
items.desc: Creates a new graphics renderer with the specified bounds and a default format.

items.name: init(bounds: CGRect, format: UIGraphicsRendererFormat)
items.desc: Creates a new graphics renderer with the given bounds and format.

items.name: var allowsImageOutput: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value specifying whether the renderer can create output images.

items.name: var format: UIGraphicsRendererFormat
items.desc: The format used to create the graphics renderer.

items.name: func runDrawingActions((UIGraphicsRendererContext) -> Void, completionActions: ((UIGraphicsRendererContext) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Performs drawing actions on a Core Graphics context that the renderer prepares.

items.name: typealias UIGraphicsDrawingActions
items.desc: A closure that executes a set of drawing instructions that the renderer applies to the Core Graphics context.

items.name: class func context(with: UIGraphicsRendererFormat) -> CGContext?
items.desc: Creates a Core Graphics context configured according to the supplied format object.

items.name: class func prepare(CGContext, with: UIGraphicsRendererContext)
items.desc: Applies the configuration specified in the renderer context to the Core Graphics context.

items.name: class func rendererContextClass() -> AnyClass
items.desc: Specifies the drawing context class used by this graphics renderer.
